channel.title: Go Humble! RSS BOOKS
channel.description: Awesome RSS Feeds about HumbleBundle books bundles!

item.title: DevOps 2025 by O'Reilly
item.content:encoded: Need to change your career prospects? Then acquire new skills—we’ve partnered with the pros at O’Reilly for a 10+ course collection of hot tech guides! Our latest bundle is tailored for DevOps professionals and rookies alike—learn from a diverse library of hot courses like Terraform Cookbook, Continuous Deployment, Policy as Code and more. Deepen your understanding whether you’re a novice or a seasoned professional, and help support Code for America with your purchase!

item.title: The Ultimate Cosplay Library
item.content:encoded: The cosplay community is enormous and passionate, but the barrier to entry can feel overwhelming to newcomers. Remove the stress of buying an expensive, poorly fitting costume and create your own looks with The Ultimate Cosplay Library Bundle! Learn to design awesome cosplays with foam, textiles, and more from 30+ ebooks like Perfect Plan of a Cosplayer, Creative Cosplay, and Cosplay Foundations. Make your cosplay dreams a reality and help support the charity of your choice with your purchase!

item.title: Connecting with Nature by Chronicle Books
item.description: Learn to connect with Mother Nature
item.content:encoded: Our latest bundle is perfect for seasoned explorers and novice hikers alike—step into the great outdoors and rediscover the power of Mother Nature with the Connecting With Nature Bundle by Chronicle Books. Read 10+ ebooks, including You Are Here: Hikes, Floret Farm's Cut Flower Garden, and A Tree a Day. Expand your horizons—take that hike, smell the roses, and help support the BINC Foundation with your purchase!

item.title: Networking Mastery by Packt
item.description: Connecting your present to your future
item.content:encoded: Become a networking mastermind and lock in the skills and knowledge you need to succeed with our latest Humble Tech Book Bundle by Packt. Inside this 20 lesson networking library, you’ll gain expert insights from hot courses like Network Automation with Nautobot, Network Architect's Handbook, Designing and Implementing Microsoft Azure Networking Solutions, and more! Take control of your future and start a new career in connectivity or polish your existing skills while supporting Make-A-Wish with your purchase.

item.title: Hellboy Expanded Universe 2025
item.content:encoded: Dive deeper into Mike Mignola’s Hellboy with even more escapades of the Right Hand of Doom. Get 30+ comics and graphic novels exploring the rich, dark, hilarious and action-packed world of the demonic superhero, Hellboy. Read red hot Hellboy titles including Hellboy in Love, Hellboy in Mexico, and Hellboy: 25 Years of Covers. Explore the expansive Hellboy Universe and help support World Central Kitchen with your purchase!

item.title: Robert Jordan's The Wheel of Time
item.description: Enter the world of The Wheel of Time, a fantasy series like no other
item.content:encoded:
Our latest bundle includes every volume of the international bestselling The Wheel of Time and connected titles, a groundbreaking epic fantasy series by Robert Jordan and completed by Brandon Sanderson. The Wheel of Time turns and Ages come and pass, leaving memories that become legend. Legend fades to myth, and even myth is long forgotten when the Age that gave it birth returns again. What was, what will be, and what is, may yet fall under the Shadow.

Since its debut in 1990, The Wheel of Time has captivated millions of readers around the globe with its scope, originality, and compelling characters, and is the basis for the original series on Prime Video. The last six books in series were all instant #1 New York Times bestsellers, and The Eye of the World was named one of America's best-loved novels by PBS's The Great American Read. Robert Jordan's epic saga traces an entire world's struggle to deal with war and destruction while one man prepares to face the embodiment of pure evil.

Enjoy these amazing titles and help support the American Civil Liberties Union (ACLU) with your purchase.

item.title: Networking and Security Cert Prep by Pearson IT Certification & Exam Cram
item.description: In a jam? Time to cram!
item.content:encoded: Don’t stress the test—to prepare for your networking and security exams with confidence all you need are the right teachers. Our latest exam cram bundle by Pearson is bursting with timely courses designed to help you ace your tests in record time. Soak in the knowledge from lessons like 31 Days Before your CCNA Exam, CISSP Cert Guide, and more. Study with efficiency and help support Xperience Studios with your purchase!

item.title: Vampire Hunter D by Dark Horse Encore
item.description: Read the novels that inspired the anime
item.content:encoded: Discover the origins of Vampire Hunter D! You may know it from the classic film, the beloved manga, or an upcoming animated series, but the saga started back in the 80s as a series of light novels by author Hideyuki Kikuchi with illustrations by legendary artist Yoshitaka Amano. Together, they tell the story of D, a human-vampire hybrid intent on righting wrongs in a supernatural, post-apocalyptic world governed by the ruling Vampire Nobility class. Read the first 29 volumes of the epic series translated into English by Dark Horse, and help support World Central Kitchen!

item.title: The Essential Writing Guides by Adams Media
item.content:encoded: A gripping script and great gameplay are the winning ingredients to a memorable project—master the written portion with the Essential Writing Guide Bundle by Adams Media. Tackle proper grammar, plot formatting, and other cornerstone skills that define the art of writing and content. Learn from the best with professional quality courses like Only Grammar Book You'll Ever Need, Big Book Of Words You Should Know To Sound Smart, and more. Master the art of the pen and help support Worldreader with your purchase!

item.title: Gardening Mastery by Quarto
item.content:encoded: Spring is on the horizon, and the perfect way to celebrate is to finally start that home garden project you’ve been talking about. Say hello to the new Gardening Mastery Bundle by Quarto! Get ebooks like Garden Pest Handbook, Containers in the Garden, Terrariums - Gardens Under Glass: Designing, Creating, and Planting Modern Indoor Gardens, and more. Succeed in cultivating your dream garden in any climate today—plus, your purchase helps support the charity of your choice!

item.title: The BattleTech RPG Collection by Catalyst Game Labs
item.description: Become a legend of mechanized mayhem
item.content:encoded: Quick—jump in the cockpit and fire up your mech—we’ve got some butt to kick! Feel the rush and excitement of roleplaying in BattleTech’s Aurigan Reach—a broken, futuristic, Earth-like land. It’s time to gather your party for The BattleTech Collection Bundle by Catalyst Game Labs and experience new adventures in awesome robots. This comprehensive bundle offers everything you need to enjoy the BattleTech experience, including lore books and new campaigns. Get BattleTech Universe, BattleTech: MechWarrior: Destiny, and much more—plus, your purchase helps support No Kid Hungry.

item.title: Spring Shonen Special by Kodansha
item.content:encoded: Say goodbye to winter and welcome the warmer weather with Spring Shonen Special Bundle by Kodansha. The shonen genre is full of action-packed stories, with amazing world building, memorable characters and exciting battles—including the series found in this bundle. Witness Yoh Asakura’s journey challenging adversaries around the world to win the Shaman Tournament and become SHAMAN KING, Shinra Kusakabe and his pyro powered comrades fight demons and shadowy organizations in Fire Force, and follow Yato, a down-on-his-luck god struggling to find worshipers in Noragami. This bundle offers nearly 100 digital volumes, giving you every volume of these outstanding series to the very last one. Act now—get the Spring Shonen Special Bundle and help support The BINC Foundation.
